title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 139 - Combining Electric Service Rendered At One Location Through Two Or More Meters In Computing Bills
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 139 - Combining Electric Service Rendered At One Location Through Two Or More Meters In Computing Bills

State Regulations
§ 139.1 - Service at single location
§ 139.2 - Two or more meters-separate computation
§ 139.3 - Two or more meters-in specified metropolitan area
§ 139.4 - Petition for combined meter reading and billing
§ 139.5 - Request of consumer for additional meters
§ 139.6 - Conjunctional billing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 139

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §
66[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
